metadata.name: Get Help from Manual Pages
metadata.description: Find information in local Linux system manual pages
objectives: Search and browse the Linux manual pages
Use man command with section numbers
Use whereis to locate binaries and man pages
Open files at specific line numbers with vi

tasks.name: Verify manual file exists
tasks.description: The /home/student/manual file should exist from lab start
tasks.failure_message: Manual file not found - run 'lab start help-manual' first
hints: Run 'lab start help-manual' to create the exercise environment

tasks.name: Verify manual file has expected content
tasks.description: The manual file should contain the expected text for the vi exercise
hints: The file should contain at least two lines
First line: 'this is the first line'
Second line should contain 'quick brown fox'

tasks.name: Verify man command is functional
tasks.description: The man command should be installed and working

tasks.name: Verify whereis can locate passwd
tasks.description: The whereis command should find passwd binary and man pages
tasks.success_message: whereis command found passwd binary and man pages
tasks.failure_message: whereis could not locate passwd properly
